2822.name: BANNED_ACCOUNT_ALL_TEMPORARILY
2822.short_description: Your account is temporarily banned from all aspects of the network.
2822.long_description: Your account is temporarily banned from all aspects of the network.
2822.short_solution: Wait for the ban to expire and don't do whatever you did to get banned.
2822.long_solution: Wait for the ban to expire and don't do whatever you did to get banned.
